issue.title: cf.emea-free.prd.media.max.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads)
 [http://cf.emea-free.prd.media.max.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fcf.emea-free.prd.media.max.com)
### Comment
> cf.emea-free.prd.media.max.com
> akm.emea-free.prd.media.max.com
> gcp.emea-free.prd.media.max.com
> These domain names are used for ad delivery in the Smart TV app of the Max ad-supported version. When the address emea-free.prd.media.max.com is blocked, it removes the ads without affecting any functionality of the application. Information about the ad-supported subscription can be found at: https://help.hbomax.com/tr-en/Answer/Detail/000002520
> 
> 
> 

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/fr81obxrzoooggogkg8cs44ww8ogss4i85g6zrqy6o.png?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
Browser: | Chrome

comment.body:
Sure, no problem @jo2dan94. Here it is:

! --- HBO Max / Max Ad & Telemetry Filter ---
! Version: 2025-11-03
! Purpose: Block SSAI ads, tracking, and telemetry in the HBO Max / Max app
! Safe for Onn TV, Android, and PC with AdGuard Home + AdGuard Premium
! ---------------------------------------------------------------

! âœ… KEEP ALLOWED (for playback stability)
@@||hbomaxcdn.com^
@@||api.play.hbomax.com^
@@||dai.google.com^$important

! ğŸš« TELEMETRY + AD SERVING DOMAINS
||conviva.com^
||scorecardresearch.com^
||googletagmanager.com^
||demdex.net^
||imrworldwide.com^
||chartbeat.net^
||omtrdc.net^
||doubleclick.net^
||crashlytics.com^
||firebaseinstallations.googleapis.com^
||firebaselogging.googleapis.com^
||firebase-settings.crashlytics.com^

! ğŸš« AD MANIFEST + SSAI PAYLOADS (force filler breaks)
||hbo.com/api/v*/ads$replace=/^\{[\s\S]*\}$/\{\}/,important
||hbo.com/v*/ads$replace=/^\{[\s\S]*\}$/\{\}/,important
||api.play.hbomax.com/v*/manifest$replace=/^\{[\s\S]*\}$/\{\}/,important
||api.play.hbomax.com/api/v*/manifest*$dnsrewrite=NXDOMAIN

! ğŸš« IMA SDK AND DAI RESOURCES (Google ad delivery)
||imasdk.googleapis.com/js/sdkloader/ima3.js$important
||dai.google.com^$important
||googleads.g.doubleclick.net^$important
||pagead2.googlesyndication.com^$important

! ğŸ§© OPTIONAL REGEX HARDENING
/^([a-z0-9-]+\.)?(conviva|omtrdc|doubleclick|googletagmanager|demdex)\.net$/
